title: didnt get prize yet STILL for OPL 2015 final
body: ok riot i wanna start off by saying. i dont want this to sound like im bit**ing about not getting my prize. but what i am asking is that when are we going to get our prizes for winning the trivia competition in the opl 2015 grand final at luna park. like i dont even mind if i DONT recieve the prize. but i am bothered that i have been anxiously waiting for my gift now for around 6 weeks. if you arent going to send it at least notify the people as id rather know so i dont keep waiting, soz my wording was HORRIBLE.

replies.body: 0h yeah and cheers for holding the event. regardless of the prize it was SIIIIIIICK
